name: mon
content:
<html><head></head><body><textarea cols="132" rows="30">
wget someServerName/pathToOutput/{DragonFlyOutputFile}
cat <<EOF > ./catalog
{DragonFlyOutputHash}
EOF
</textarea>

<tkBookmark collection="mon" name="situationXml"/>
<tkBookmark collection="mon" name="eventMap"/>
<tkBookmark collection="mon" name="eventDest"/>
<tkBookmark collection="mon" name="props"/>
<tkBookmark collection="mon" name="conf" column="AGENT"/>

</body></html>

provider.columns: *, CONCAT(WPA1,",",WPA2,",",WPA3) as WPAS, CONCAT(EIF1,",",EIF2,",",EIF3) as EIFS, CONCAT(HBEIF1,",",HBEIF2) as HBEIFS
